Description: Limestone lintel; cartouches of Siamun flanked on either side by the adoring figures of Ankhefenmut.
Curator's comments: Petrie, Memphis II: pl.24 [left, bottom] PM III (2): 853-4 Mysliwiec, Royal Portraiture of the Dynasties XXI-XXX (1988): 6, 13, 113; pl. XIc-d
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2011-13, Travelling Exhibition, Mummy: The Inside Story 19th Nov 2011- 11 Mar 2012. Richmond , VA, Virginia Museum of Fine Art. Mummy. The inside story. 2016 8 Mar-12 Jun, Cleveland, Cleveland Museum of Art, Pharoah: King of Egypt 2018 7 Jun-16 Sep, Barcelona, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt 2018-2019 16 Oct-20 jan, Madrid, La Caixa, Pharaoh: King of Egypt
